name: QoS-Aware Scheduler
summary: The QoS-Aware Scheduler feature allows the configuration of the scheduler on a QCI basis. This

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.priority
parameters.description: The parameter QciProfilePredefined.priority                                 assigns priorities for scheduling. For the default parameter                                 parameter values, see 3GPP 23.203.

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.schedulingAlgorithm
parameters.description: The parameter                                     QciProfilePredefined.schedulingAlgorithm                                 selects the scheduling algorithm (on a QCI basis) that is used                                 during scheduling.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure in the RLC layer.                                     One sample for each RLC SDU sent to MAC. The time for each                                     sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU), until the                                     packet is sent to the MAC layer entity for transmission on the                                     air.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: Number of samples to be used in downlink MAC delay measure                                     calculations.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: Aggregated time samples for the downlink latency measure. The                                     time is between reception of a PDCP SDU until the first                                     successful transmission of a MAC SDU are transmitted.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: Number of samples to be used in downlink latency measure                                     calculations.

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.priorityFraction
parameters.type: Defines the decimal point of the new priority for predefined                                     QCIs.

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.priorityFraction
parameters.type: Defines the decimal point of the new priority for                                     operator-defined QCIs.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure in the RLC layer.                                     One sample for each RLC SDU sent to MAC. The time for each                                     sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU), until the                                     packet is sent to the MAC layer entity for transmission on the                                     air.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: Number of samples to be used in downlink MAC delay measure                                     calculations.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: Aggregated time samples for the downlink latency measure. The                                     time is between reception of a PDCP SDU until the first                                     successful transmission of a MAC SDU are transmitted.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: Number of samples to be used in downlink latency measure                                     calculations.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010959 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010959 MO instance.
